name: Beginner Hiking and Trail Safety
description: Learn the basics of hiking, including trail safety, navigation, and essential gear. Perfect for beginners looking to explore the great outdoors safely.

name: Advanced Kayaking Techniques
description: Master advanced kayaking techniques, including white-water paddling and safety maneuvers. Ideal for those with prior kayaking experience.

name: Orienteering Basics for Adventurers
description: Learn essential orienteering skills, including map reading and compass navigation. A great course for anyone interested in backcountry navigation.

name: Introduction to Rock Climbing
description: Get started with rock climbing. This course covers climbing techniques, safety measures, and equipment handling.

name: Nature and Wildlife Photography
description: Capture the beauty of nature with this photography course. Learn techniques for shooting wildlife, landscapes, and outdoor scenes.

name: Stand-Up Paddleboarding (SUP) Basics
description: An introduction to stand-up paddleboarding, covering balance, paddling techniques, and water safety.

name: Campfire Cooking and Wilderness Survival
description: Learn how to cook delicious meals over a campfire and pick up essential wilderness survival skills.

name: Mountain Biking Adventure
description: Experience the thrill of mountain biking with this adventure course. Suitable for riders looking to improve their skills on rough terrains.

name: Advanced Wilderness Navigation
description: This advanced course dives deep into navigation techniques for challenging terrains using topographic maps and GPS devices.

name: Family-Friendly Nature Hike
description: A guided nature hike suitable for families and kids. Learn about local flora and fauna while enjoying an easy trail.

name: Ocean Kayaking Expedition
description: Join an ocean kayaking expedition to explore coastal waters. Learn sea kayaking techniques and ocean safety protocols.

name: Outdoor Yoga and Meditation
description: Reconnect with nature through outdoor yoga and meditation sessions. Ideal for stress relief and mental wellness.

name: Wilderness First Aid
description: Learn critical first aid skills for the wilderness. This course covers injury prevention, treatment, and emergency response in remote areas.

name: Backpacking Essentials
description: Discover the essentials of backpacking, including packing, setting up camp, and cooking in the wild. Perfect for beginner backpackers.

name: Intro to Scuba Diving
description: Get an introduction to scuba diving in this beginner-friendly course. Learn the basics of underwater diving and marine exploration.

name: Intermediate Rock Climbing
description: Build on your climbing skills with this intermediate course, focusing on advanced techniques and safety protocols for climbing more challenging routes.

name: Forest Survival Skills
description: Learn essential forest survival skills, including shelter building, fire starting, and finding food and water in the wild.

name: Nature Art and Craft
description: Explore your creativity with this nature-themed art and craft course. Learn how to use natural materials to create unique art pieces.

name: River Rafting Adventure
description: Join a thrilling river rafting adventure. Learn paddling techniques, safety protocols, and enjoy an adrenaline-pumping ride down the rapids.

name: Desert Hiking and Survival
description: Explore the unique challenges of desert hiking. Learn survival techniques specific to arid environments, including hydration and heat management.
